title: Merely steps away from sequestered pocket of the Delaware Bay!!!
description: Cottage charm on N. Carolina Ave. ! Merely steps away from sequestered pocket of the Delaware Bay and walkable to general store, this adorable 1BR/1bath, lots-of-main-space ranch touts open floor plan and off-the-charts architectural interest. Take in vaulted ceilings, exposed beams, skylights, open pass-through and use of natural wood throughout, all paint a portrait of earthy and easy beach living. Stone driveway with ample parking fronts this pigeon-gray wood shingled home with pitched roofline, porthole window and covered front porch edged with pillars, while landscaped beds punctuated with thriving flowers and ornamental trees provide bursts of color and all-season greenery. Entry provides instant invitation to unwind with its tumble marble ceramic tile floor and gorgeous stone floor-to-ceiling FP straight ahead. Step up to hardwood floors and great room before FP where vaulted ceiling, exposed beams and ceiling fan are added accents. To left is L -shaped Corian countertop bar where 5 bar stools wrap and 3 pendant lights illuminate area. Maple cabinets, complete with DW and tumble marble backsplash with stunning ceramic glass decorative square inset, provide backdrop for tile splash and bowl sink. Pull up a stool, sit and soak up the beach vibe. Beyond bar area is DR where hardwood floors continue and 3 windows with natural wood trim span front wall. Just-right all-around ambiance with its corner cabinet, bamboo-leaf ceiling fan and built-in desk area with 2 stools tucked under. From DR to kitchen hardwoods transition back to tumble marble ceramic tile floor and gallery bar opens up to spacious trendy kitchen.

I live on Social Security at this time which I receive on the 3rd Wednesday of each month, can pay $500 or more a month depending on the what we discuss. Would prefer my own room and bathroon but because of my current as of today financial situation I'm aware that might not be possible.
I do not have much until that Wednesday this month to offer but can do other things to help out, I love animals and especially Dog's, also can cook or...not sure what else to write about that and if you have anymore question feel free to call or text ( I prefer open clear communication so calling would be better )

Need Bedroom and Bath to Rent Private Home / Apt
Mature
Clean Quiet and Respectful of your home
Easy going Gay Friendly

Please feel free to contact with any questions or issues
Easy to get along with and open to suggestions
Sincerely Need a home with Private Bedroom and Bath
I have No Pets

Appreciate your Help and suggestions
I'm very laid back and easy going.
In my free time I'm either catching waves, fishing, or working out.
I'm not a partier but do enjoy a drink once a month if that.
I'm not the type to get in an argument over something, I'd rather talk things over and see how we can work it out.
Always happy to do my share of cleaning. I've had roomates in the past so these living situations aren't new to me.
I work in Newport Beach Monday through Friday from 9:00am to 5:30pm.
I'm rarely home on the weekends.
Access to the kitchen, laundry, and wifi are a must.
Vaccinated and boosted, but I still got Covid back in February, not sure how resistant I am anymore. With regard to cleanliness my room can get kinda messy but I clean and vacuum my area once a week. As for communal areas, I do a pretty good job of making sure I don't leave any of my mess behind.

I've got nothing against drugs/alcohol as long as you've got your stuff under control and it doesn't create any living problems.
If you rent something weekly or month-to-month, that'd be great. I'd like either a room or a space to be able to securely and comfortably store all my stuff. I've got like a 3 big duffel bags, a few small duffels, and some basket tubs of toiletries and a couple of other things I want to hang on to. So, not A LOT, but, I still need adequate space.

Currently we are just trying to stay afloat staying in hotels/motels/inns in the area,
I live on Social Security at this time which I receive on the 3rd Wednesday of each month, can pay $500 or more a month depending on the what we discuss. Would prefer my own room and bathroon but because of my current as of today financial situation I'm aware that might not be possible.
I do not have much until that Wednesday this month to offer but can do other things to help out, I love animals and especially Dog's, also can cook or...not sure what else to write about that and if you have anymore question feel free to call or text ( I prefer open clear communication so calling would be better )
Im a 46 Year old African American Straight . I do not Drink,smoke or use drugs.
I do not have any Kids. I keep to myself,Church Goer.I am constantly On the Move. I also Have a very strong background in working with Children and The elderly.
I am looking to find a Room By First week in September.I am an early bird.Usually Asleep By 10pm.,Very respectful of others space and property.I will not have any Guests Over.If you have space available please let me know.
Need Bedroom and Bath to Rent Private Home / Apt
Mature
Clean Quiet and Respectful of your home
Easy going Gay Friendly
Willing to Share Expenses and Utilities as a Roommate
Prefer Long Beach and surrounding areas
Please feel free to contact with any questions or issues
Easy to get along with and open to suggestions
Sincerely Need a home with Private Bedroom and Bath
I have No Pets
Dogs are OK
Appreciate your Help and suggestions
I'm very laid back and easy going.
In my free time I'm either catching waves, fishing, or working out.
I'm not a partier but do enjoy a drink once a month if that.
I'm not the type to get in an argument over something, I'd rather talk things over and see how we can work it out.
Always happy to do my share of cleaning. I've had roomates in the past so these living situations aren't new to me.
I work in Newport Beach Monday through Friday from 9:00am to 5:30pm.
I'm rarely home on the weekends.
Access to the kitchen, laundry, and wifi are a must.
Vaccinated and boosted, but I still got Covid back in February, not sure how resistant I am anymore. With regard to cleanliness my room can get kinda messy but I clean and vacuum my area once a week. As for communal areas, I do a pretty good job of making sure I don't leave any of my mess behind.
I'm a night owl, I don't need absolute quiet to sleep just as long as it's not absurdly noisy. Something to note is that I'll usually work late into the evening past 11pm, but no meetings. I'm just coding so the only noise I'll make is the noise from my keyboard. As far as drugs/alcohol goes I'll have a Whiteclaw about once a week, not really into anything else. I've got nothing against drugs/alcohol as long as you've got your stuff under control and it doesn't create any living problems.
If you rent something weekly or month-to-month, that'd be great. I'd like either a room or a space to be able to securely and comfortably store all my stuff. I've got like a 3 big duffel bags, a few small duffels, and some basket tubs of toiletries and a couple of other things I want to hang on to. So, not A LOT, but, I still need adequate space.

We can discuss budget if we want, but most housing options are going to be in the $3000 range so I need somebody who is able to pitch at least $1500.

title: Relocating? Weekly rates starting at $620.
description:
A budget-friendly extended stay hotel in Bethlehem, PA
We invite you to experience the conveniences of home at WoodSpring Suites® Allentown Bethlehem. Our all-suite hotel with in-room kitchens is the perfect choice for your extended stay, whether it’s for a week, a month, or longer. We offer low nightly, weekly, and monthly hotel rates to help save you money. Plus, you'll enjoy free WiFi, guest laundry facilities and free parking at our 100% smoke-free, pet-friendly property, making your stay simple and hassle-free.
You'll enjoy quick access to a variety of destinations and attractions when you stay at our hotel in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. If you’d like to take advantage of public transportation, we're right on the 108, 217, 319, and 327 local LANta bus routes, while the Amtrak Bus Station is just 6 miles away. We're about 8 miles from the Lehigh Valley International Airport/ABE Airport. $50 to $100 Deposit.
Hotel at a Glance
5 miles to Lehigh Valley Hospital Muhlenberg
6 miles to St. Luke’s Hospital Anderson Campus
6 miles to Greyhound and Amtrak stations
8 miles to Lehigh Valley International Airport
Nightly, weekly and monthly hotel rates
Full kitchen in every room
Guest Rooms
Visit our extended stay hotel and select the suite layout that meets your needs. Each layout features a combination of double-/full-sized beds and sleeper sofas, as well as a dresser, nightstand and shelves. All suites also include a kitchen with full-size refrigerator, stovetop, microwave, cupboards and prep sink. Sit back and relax during your stay while enjoying free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite and a premium movie channel. Every-other-week housekeeping services are provided for long-stay guests. Additional items—including a linen exchange, cookware, dishes, and more frequent housekeeping—are available for purchase at the front desk.
Explore activities for all ages in Allentown Bethlehem
You're in the heart of it all when you stay at WoodSpring Suites in Allentown Bethlehem, where you'll find a variety of exciting attractions and destinations. History buffs will enjoy visiting the nearby Pennsbury Manor, the reconstructed estate of William Penn, who founded the Pennsylvania colony. We're also an easy drive to a number of family friendly activities, including Crayola Experience, Dorney Park and Wildwater Kingdom, and Lehigh Valley Zoo. Artists and creative types will want to check out the Banana Factory Arts Center, a collection of galleries and arts programs partly housed in a former banana distribution warehouse, about 9 miles away.
Show Less
Pet Policy
Service animals are welcome at no additional charge, must be registered at front desk. Limit 2 dogs, under 75 lbs. per room. No cats. Non-refundable pet fees, 50 USD a pet reg fee and 10 USD a pet per night charge for the duration of the stay.
Hotel Alert: Some hotel features and amenities may be modified or unavailable due to COVID-19. For more information, please call your hotel directly.
Amenities to help you stay awhile
WoodSpring Suites is an extended stay hotel with clean and comfortable rooms, and a professional, friendly staff that’s available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our 100% smoke-free hotel offers pet-friendly hotel rooms, free parking, guest laundry facilities and conveniently located vending machines. Daily, weekly and monthly hotel rates are available.

description:
Welcome to 11 Wharton Dr, Glen Mills, PA!!! This large END UNIT with 4 large bedrooms, 2.5 bath, 2 car garage town house is located in the Award Winning West Chester School District and is in move-in ready state for renting from September 1st. The open floor house plan ensures you never have to miss a family moment in this house. The pantry, larger cabinets, the marble counter top kitchen is a dream for any cook. Separate dinning area and living room provides more space for the family on the 1st floor and help host guests.
